```{r}

# EDA

generic <- growth_data %>% 
  select(1:9, -fips, -stateabb)

for (i in 3:8) {
  data = subset(generic, grade == i)
  print(ggplot(data, aes(mn_all, color = subject)) +
  geom_density() + 
  labs(title = paste("Distribution of students in grade", i, sep = " ")) + 
  scale_x_continuous(name = "Achievement Level",
                           breaks = 0:15,
                           limits=c(0, 15)))
}

```
